title: Chintz Border, ca. 1800
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave foundation. Mordant for 2 reds, black and purple applied over resist. Madder dyed. Blue applied by immersion over resist. Yellow applied over blue for green (chintz).
description: Portion of a border showing a peacock-like bird and an enormous flower.

tombstone.epitaph:
Chintz Border, ca. 1800.
ca. 1800. Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave foundation. Mordant for 2 reds, black and purple applied over resist. Madder dyed. Blue applied by immersion over resist. Yellow applied over blue for green (chintz).. Gift of Josephine Howell. 1973-51-36.
